<|channel|>analysis<|message|>We have already read the Complaint fully. We need to extract Cause_of_Action, Statutory_or_Constitutional_Basis_for_the_Case, Remedy_Sought. The Complaint likely contains these. We need to extract all distinct values.

Also maybe "disparate impact claim" under Title VII. So we have to capture distinct values. Remedy: Prayer: to order city not to use written tests, to provide make-whole remedial relief, adopt other measures, costs, etc. So remedy sought: injunctive relief (stop using tests), declaratory judgment? Not explicitly. Also damages: make-whole remedial relief. Also costs.

Let's identify distinct causes:

From Complaint: "enforce Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e, et seq." So cause: "Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964" (disparate impact claim). Also "pattern or practice claim under § 707 of Title VII". Also maybe "disparate impact claim" under Title VII. But the cause-of-action is Title VII. The legal theory is Title VII disparate impact. Now we need evidence. We have the Complaint text. We need to extract text snippets. For reliability, we can quote the lines:

From the Complaint:

Line at start: "This action is brought on behalf of the United States to enforce Title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e, et seq. (“Title VII”)."

Also "This Court has jurisdiction of this action under 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-6(b) and 28 U.S.C. §§ 1331, 1343(a)(3), and 1345."

Also "the policy ... does not meet the requirements of Section 703(k) of Title VII, 42 U.S.C. § 2000e-2(k)."

Also "the policies ... constitute a pattern or practice claim under Section 707 of Title VII."

We need to capture those.

Also remedy: see prayer:

"WHEREFORE, the United States prays that the Court order the City of Durham, and its officers, agents, employees, successors, and all persons in active concert or participation with them, including DFD to: a. refrain from using written tests to screen and select applicants for DFD entry-level firefighter positions where such uses result in a disparate impact on African Americans, ... b. provide make whole remedial relief to all persons who have suffered individual loss as a result of the discrimination alleged in this Complaint; and c. adopt other appropriate nondiscriminatory measures to correct the present effects of its discriminatory policies and practices, including the use of entry-level firefighter selection procedures that comply with Title VII."

Also "Plaintiff United States prays for such additional relief as justice may require, together with its costs and disbursements in this action."
